thread.title: Trump rants at Jewish journalist asks about anti-Semitism
thread.title_full: Trump rants at Jewish journalist asks about anti-Semitism

title: Trump rants at Jewish journalist asks about anti-Semitism
text: show ad 'Very insulting question': Trump in bizarre rant at Jewish journalist who asks about anti-Semitism after claiming 'he lied' about being a 'friendly reporter' President Donald Trump pushed back aggressively after a Jewish reporter asked him his plans to curb rising anti-Semitism Trump, who had asked for a 'friendly reporter,' was peeved at the query, saying the reporter 'lied' and the question was 'very dishonest' Jake Turx of Ami Magazine later took to Twitter and said he thought the president had 'misunderstood' his question
